channel.title: uKnit quickstart on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in uKnit quickstart on Codetab

item.title: uKnit - CodeTab
item.description: uKnit Quickstart To generate tests with uKnit the preferred, also the easier, is to add uknit-core as a dependency in your project pom. We explain this with uknit-quickstart example and you can use uKnit in the same way with your project. Download and import the latest uknit-quickstart.zip release from Uknit Releases. Installation process for Eclipse and IntelliJ IDEA is explained below and the procedure is more or less same for other IDE.
